mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reports of Sr George Croke kt: Late one of the justices of the Court of Kings-bench, and formerly one of the justices of the Court of Common-bench; of such select cases as were adjudged in the said courts .. [1582-1641] / Collected and written in French by himself; rev. and pub. in English, by Sir Harbottle Grimston, baronet
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Croke, George, approximately 1560-1642
England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
Grimston, Harbottle, 1603-1685
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by W. Rawlins, S. Roycroft, and H. Sawbridge, assigns of Richard and Edward Atkins, esquires; and are to be sold by H. Twyford [etc.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1st pt. Cases from 24th-44/46th Eliz.-- 2d pt. Jas.-- 3d pt. Through 16 Chas.
At head of title for first part: "Though last publish't."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain.
